# RPG Site Copilot Instructions

Follow all guidelines from `.agent/rules/project.md`

## Quick Reference
- **Stack**: React 18 + TypeScript + Tailwind
- **Colors**: Use pixel- prefixed Tailwind classes
- **Components**: Named exports, TypeScript interfaces
- **Animations**: Framer Motion only
- **Style**: Pixel-art aesthetic, retro gaming vibes

## Code Generation Preferences
- Generate TypeScript, not JavaScript
- Include responsive design by default
- Add Framer Motion animations to interactive elements
- Use shadcn/ui components when available
